meanings.sent1: I saw a tank full of octopi at the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: The octopi in the ocean were gracefully moving through the water.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly added too many octopi to the seafood stew!
meanings.sent4: The octopi's arms reached out like dancers on a stage.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful octopi at the marine exhibit.

meanings.definition: A group of eight-legged marine animals.
meanings.sent1: The octopi swam together in a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of octopi in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The octopi held a meeting to discuss their underwater adventures.
meanings.sent4: The octopi's intelligence was evident in their problem-solving skills.
meanings.sent5: The octopi changed color to blend in with their surroundings, impressing the onlookers.
